[[inst_lw_umin]]
==== LW.UMIN

*Syntax:* lw.umin<.{aq, rl, f, aqrl, aqf, rlf, aqrlf}> [SrcL], SrcR, {->t, ->u, ->Rd}

*Description:* Atomic Unsigned Min operation: memory value is atomically unsigned mined with register.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_lw_umin.svg[LW.UMIN encoding,width=800]

*Group:* AMO/AMO
